snippet: Julian Robertson, founder of the Tiger Management hedge fund, helped start several careers. Now those managers are helping others begin their own firms.
abstract: Julian Robertson, founder of the Tiger Management hedge fund, helped start several careers. Now those managers are helping others begin their own firms.

byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and AZAM AHMED

snippet: Julian Robertson, founder of the Tiger Management hedge fund, helped start several careers. Now those managers are helping others begin their own firms.
abstract: Julian Robertson, founder of the Tiger Management hedge fund, helped start several careers; those managers are now helping others begin their own firms, including Richard Gerson; Gerson's new firm, Falcon Edge, raised $1.2 billion, one of the biggest hedge fund start-ups since the financial crisis.

byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and AZAM AHMED

snippet: Apple is said to be ready to introduce a new iPhone with an event on Sept. 12, according to a person with knowledge of Apple's plans.
abstract: Apple is said to be ready to introduce a new iPhone with an event on Sept. 12, according to a person with knowledge of Apple's plans.

snippet: Does environmentally responsible spending make a difference, or just make people feel better about buying things?

snippet: The audit criticized the Metropolitan Transportation Authority for a process that “was not a level playing field, was not fair to all potential bidders and was significantly slanted in Apple’s favor.”

snippet: They are catching on around the world -- from China to Tennessee -- and New York may, finally, be catching up. What difference do bike-sharing program really make to cities? To the environment? And where do you bike-share?

snippet: A major patent dispute between Apple and Samsung Electronics comes to a head this week in a federal court in San Jose, Calif., Steve Lohr reports in Monday's New York Times.
abstract: A major patent dispute between Apple and Samsung Electronics comes to a head this week in a federal court in San Jose, Calif., Steve Lohr reports in Monday's New York Times.

headline.main: Daily Report: Testing the Strength of Apple's Patents

snippet: They are not infallible design geniuses at Apple. Its MagSafe connector used to be a design marvel and a joy to use. Then Apple made it worse. It's now annoying and useless.
abstract: They are not infallible design geniuses at Apple. Its MagSafe connector used to be a design marvel and a joy to use. Then Apple made it worse. It's now annoying and useless.

headline.main: One of Apple's Best Ideas Ever -- Made Worse
